"...super duper potent..." - Amy2 üíñ

üìë "Cheesecake... a sweet dessert consisting of 1 or more layers...main & thickest

sugar; if there is a bottom layer it ...consists of a crust or base made from crushed 
cookies (or digestive biscuits), graham crackers, pastry, or sponge cake.[1] It may be 
baked or unbaked (usually refrigerated). 
....is usually sweetened with sugar..." - en.wikipedia.org
